results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-77695c4ff6-xzcq5

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-77695c4ff6-xzcq5], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready, though one is expected.

Solution: 
1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`.
2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-deployment-77695c4ff6-xzcq5`.
3. Resolve any issues found (e.g., image errors, resource limits).
4. Verify readiness probes.
